sentence: The room was clean and facilities quite up to date
We enjoyed the sauna pool facilities which was an added bonus
Very central location within walking distance to Gamla Stan shopping the City Hall and the central transportation center
Breakfast is excellent but the breakfast room does get busy later on and the Lobby Bar menu is also very good
Terrific location one aspect of which is that it is 25 yards from the side entrance to the Central Station and the super express airport train
Gym access and helpful sraf

The room was clean and just renovated location was the best just few steps from central station and one road cross to the shopping area Gym and pool closes at 6 pm it was not convinient cor us as we go all day out and everything closes there early so the iny thing we ciuld do is gym and pool byt sad they close it at 6 pm even before we arrive the hotel
The service of all members of staff from the cleaners to the reception staff was exceptional
Also reception staff is very kind to let me know the access for bus and metro
Hotel has nice facilities good and functioning services for both business and pleasure

Very friendly staff however our room was small the toilet door did fit the door frame and provided no privacy and most of the lifts were out of order for our two day stay which was very inconvenient staying on the 9th floor
Also they close Gym and swimming pool on Saturday 6 pm
Good touristic stay but there was a lot of noise day and late night due to several children running through the hall and knocking doors
And oh like the elevator the cappuccino machine yes just one was broken one morning
When we raised the issue with the reception after consulting the manager we received nothing
The reception lobby was very impressive but the actual bedroom was very dated and uninviting
The lobby area seemed updated and pleasant
Great except for the elevators were exceptionally slow
Smelly corridors old rooms cheap interior designed in 70s no AC stressed hosekepers that forget items lifts of all kinds not matching each other poor number of Tv channels etc etc etc
Female reception staff were not welcoming and we waited for some time to check in
Lights in the room could be better especially in the hallway
You can have a proper work out here something unusual for gyms at hotels
No robes or slippers available for use in the spa pool and when requested from reception they had run out
Limited elevators due to repairs
Certain facilities closed but not announced during booking as well

Attitude of the reception staff long time to check in one of the reception staff his name Rodriguez tried to fool me and give me different room wich I booked he lied that they do not have the same category which I booked and tried to blame booking
There are insufficient signs leading to the polgym not marked on the elevator floor legend
My door opened outwards so anyone in the main hotel hallway could see into my room if I was getting changed
